content: नट् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (नटति, the न not changed to ण after प्र in the sense of ‘hurting’) {@--1@} To dance; यदि मनसा नटनीयं <ls>Gīt. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To act. {@--3@} To injure (by a deceptive trick). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (नाटयति-ते) {@--1@} To act, gesticulate, represent dramatically (in dramas); शरसंधानं नाटयति <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> &c. {@--2@} To imitate, copy; स्फटिककटकभूमिर्नाटयत्येष शैलः… अधिगतधवलिम्नः शूलपाणेरभिख्यां <ls>Śi. 4. 65.</ls> ({%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} नट् forms नटयति in the sense of ‘causing to dance’; <ls>Bh. 3. 126</ls>). {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (नाटयति-ते) {@--1@} To drop or fall. {@--2@} To shine. {@--3@} To injure.
